onlyOnePlayer: Only one player can be used as argument
ownerTransferFail: Only the owner may transfer claims
noPermission: You don't have the required permissions to do that here!
noPermissionSimple: Sorry you can't do that here!
minClaimSize: This is too small. Minimum claimsize is %d
landClaimDisabledWorld: Claiming is disabled in this world
wrongMode: Wrong claim mode. You are in %s-mode
stringScreenReturn: Click on paper to go back
playerModify: Modified permission group for following players to %1$s: %2$s
playerModifyNo: Couldn't set permission group for the players. Probably cause they already belong to a group
playerGroupAddFail: Couldn't add that player to the group either cause the player is already in a group or no player matching the name was found
deleteAllClaimConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all claims? Type it again to confirm
deleteClaimError: You can't delete this claim here
deleteSubClaimAll: All Subclaims from this claim deleted
adminDeleteAll: Deleted all claims for following players: %s
readConflict: %1$s conflicts with existing claims. Not added to world! Conflicts:
EDITCLAIM.desc: Gives permission to edit (resize, delete...) the claim
EDITPERMS.desc: Gives permission to change the claims permissions
BREAK.desc: Permission to break blocks in the claim
PLACE.desc: Permission to place blocks in the claim
OPENCONTAINER.desc: Permission to open containers (chest, furnace etc.)
BUTTONLEVER.desc: Permission to trigger levers and buttons
ITEMFRAMEROTATE.desc: Permission to rotate items in item frames
LECTERNTAKE.desc: Permission to change books in a lectern
PROJECTILES.desc: Permission to let shot projectiles interact with blocks (e.g. arrow on button)
TRAMPLE.desc: Permission to enable block trampling (farmland, turtle eggs)
RAID.desc: Permission to trigger raids in claim. Wont prevent raids (just) outside
BUCKET.desc: Permission to take liquids with buckets
ANIMALINTERACT.desc: Permission to interact with animals (e.g. shearing sheeps)
XP.desc: Permission to pick up xp orbs
ARMORSTAND.desc: Permission to interact with armor stands
BREAKNONLIVING.desc: Permission to break things like minecarts or armor stands
WITHER.desc: Toggle wither breaking blocks in claim
PISTONBORDER.desc: Toggle piston pull/push across claim borders
